programme.title: Men's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 1500m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. Bobby Finke (USA) claimed Gold with a World Record time of 14:30.67, Gregorio Paltrinieri (ITA) took Silver and Daniel Wiffen (IRL) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x100m Medley Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x100m Medley Relay was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. The People's Republic of China claimed Gold with a time of 3:27.46min, The United States of America took Silver and France completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Medley Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x100m Medley Relay was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. The United States of America claimed Gold with a World Record time of 3:49.63, Australia took Silver and The People's Republic of China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Yuan Cao (CHN) won Gold, Rikuto Tamai (JPN) won Silver and Noah Williams (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Teams Free Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Free Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 06/08/24.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Teams Acrobatic Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Acrobatic Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 07/08/24. Team People's Republic of China won Gold, United States of America won Silver and Spain completed the podium.

programme.title: Duets Technical Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Technical Routine took place at the Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 09/08/24.

programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Semi-Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Semi-Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 10/08/24.

programme.title: Duets Free Routine Final | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Free Routine Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Liuyi Wang/Quianyi Wang (CHN) won Gold, Kate Shortman/Isabelle Thorpe (GBR) won Silver and Bregje de Brouwer/Noortje de Brouwer (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Individual Medley was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Summer McIntosh (CAN) claimed Gold with a time of 4:27:17, Katie Grimes (USA) took Silver and Emma Weyant (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Freestyle was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. David Popovici (ROU) claimed Gold with a time of 1:44.72. Matthew Richards (GBR) took Silver and Luke Hobson (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Backstroke was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Thomas Ceccon (ITA) claimed Gold with a time of 52.00, Xu Jiayu (CHN) took Silver and Ryan Murphy (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Breaststroke was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Tatjana Smith (RSA) claimed Gold with a time of 1:05.28, Qianting Tang (CHN) took Silver and Mona McSharry (IRL) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Freestyle was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Mollie O'Callaghan (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 1:53.27, Ariarne Titmus (AUS) took Silver and Siobhan Bernadette Haughey (HKG) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Backstroke was held on 30/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 57.33 seconds, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Katharine Berkoff (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 800m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 800m Freestyle was held on 30/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Daniel Wiffen (IRL) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 7:38.19, Bobby Finke (USA) took Silver and Gregorio Paltrinieri (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Aya: the first female swimmer to represent Gabon at the Olympics | Playing Fields
programme.desc: An Olympic swimmer overcomes her tragic past and is determined to keep swimming. We see the inspiring relationship she has with her father as they train for future competitions.

programme.title: AUS-USA - Women's Semi-Final | Water Polo | Olympics Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Semi-Final match between Australia v The United States of America took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 08/08/24. Final score AUS 8(6):(5)8 USA.

programme.title: SRB - USA - Men's Semi-Final | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Semi-Final match between Serbia v The United States of America took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score SRB 10:6 USA.

programme.title: USA-NED - Women's Bronze Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match The United States of America v Netherlands took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Netherlands won the Bronze with a final score NED 11:10 USA.

programme.title: Men's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Zhanle Pan (CHN) claimed Gold with a new World Record time of 46.40 seconds, Kyle Chalmers (AUS) took Silver, and David Popovici (ROU) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Individual Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time 1:54.06, Duncan Scott (GBR) took Silver and Wang Shun (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 800m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 800m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 03/08/2024. Katie Ledecky (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 08:11.04, Ariarne Titmus (AUS) took Silver and Paige Madden (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: 4x100m Mixed Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The 4x100m Mixed Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 03/08/2024. The United States of America claimed Gold with a World record time of 3:37.43, The People's Republic of China took Silver and Australia completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. Sarah Sjoestroem (SWE) claimed Gold with a time of 23.71, Meg Harris (AUS) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Women's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 06/08/24. Quan Hongchan (CHN) won Gold, Chen Yuxi (CHN) won Silver and Kim Mi Rae (PRK) completed the podium.

programme.title: Duets Technical Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Technical Routine took place at the Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 09/08/24.

programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Semi-Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Semi-Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 10/08/24.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's Greco-Roman & Women's Freestyle - Day 12 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Greco-Roman 67kg and 87kg Semifinals and the Greco-Roman 77kg and 97kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 53kg Semifinals and the Freestyle 50kg Finals.

programme.title: The (Body) Art of a Fencer: Miles Chamley-Watson ft. Noma Han
programme.desc: Fencing is a creative Olympic sport. Miles Chamley-Watson knows better to have Noma Han, his creative muse and tattoo artist, on his team.

programme.title: Rulon | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: At the 2000 Olympic Games, American wrestler Rulon Gardner beat the unbeatable and became an overnight sensation. But what came after the ‘Miracle on the Mat’ was even more unpredictable.

programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match IND-ESP | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze ,Medal Match with India and Spain took place on the 08/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 2. Final Score IND 2:1 ESP.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Rebels
programme.desc: See how rebels on and off the field broke through limits by using fashion to share bold new ideas.

programme.title: FRA-ESP - Men's Gold Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match France v Spain, at Parc des Princes, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score ESP 5:3 FRA.

programme.title: Women's Long Jump Heptathlon Group A | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Long Jump Heptathlon Group A took place at Stade de France, France, on 09/08/2024. Sofie Dokter (NED) ranked to first place with a distance of 6.26m. Adrianna Sulek-Schubert (POL) ranked second and Xenia Krizsan (HUN) came third.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 14 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 14 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, Paris, on 09/08/24. It included the Final for Women's 4 x 400m Relay, where Team USA claimed the Gold. At the Women's Shot Put Final, it was Yemisi Ogunleye (GER) who would win the Gold medal. Later, at the Men's 4 x 100m Relay Final, it was Team Canada at the top, with the Gold. At the Women's 400m Final, Marileidy Paulino (DOM) claimed victory, and the Gold, while at the Men's Triple Jump Final Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) took the Gold. At the Women's 10,000m Final, Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won another Gold medal, and finally, at the Men's 400m Hurdles Final Rai Benjamin (USA) claimed victory, and the Gold Medal.

programme.title: The Vault: Matthias Steiner, Olympic timekeeping, Sky Brown, Dream Team
programme.desc: Weightlifting legend Matthias Steiner comes to The Vault to share his incredible stories and discover his kit on display at the Olympic Museum for the first time. Sky Brown who donated her skateboard shares her emotion in winning a medal at Tokyo 2020. Jeannette discovers the magic eye camera from London 1948 while Rob finds Michael Jordan’s iconic shoes from Barcelona 1992 which leads him to an unexpected “other dream team” story linking the Olympic and the Grateful Dead.

programme.title: Men's Triple Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Triple Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) won the Gold with a distance of 17.86m. Pedro Pichardo (POR) won the Silver, and Andy Diaz Hernandez (ITA) claimed the Bronze.
